bill.title: Trespassing; increase the fine for.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 97-17-93, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Increase The Fine For The First Offense Of Trespassing From $250.00 To $500.00; To Increase The Fine For The Second Or Subsequent Offense Of Trespassing From $500.00 To $1,000.00; To Provide That Upon Conviction Under This Section, Any Person Who Holds A Nonresident Hunting Or Fishing License Issued By The Commission On Wildlife, Fisheries And Parks Shall Have His Or Her Nonresident License Suspended For A Period Of Twenty-four Months From The Date Of The Conviction; To Amend 49-7-27, Mississippi Code Of 1972, In Conformity To The Provisions Of This Act; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Wildlife, Fisheries and Parks
